alert.note: Alert for Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 1:19PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A GUSTY SHOWER WILL IMPACT EASTERN TIOGA COUNTY THROUGH 145 PM EDT... At 117 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower along a line extending from Elkland to Wellsboro. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Arnot around 125 PM EDT. Covington around 130 PM EDT. Mansfield, Blossburg and Millerton around 130 PM EDT. Ogdensburg around 140 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Tioga, Tioga Junction, Roseville and Mansfield University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
